resources.string: You agree by using this app to continue to abide by the rules of the road. Using this application by no means allows you to start driving recklessly and endanger the lives of others or yourself. The purpose of this application is merely to assist you in becoming a better, safer driver.Disclaimer :This app is not for use while operating a vehicle. You, the user, are solely responsible for any situation that may occur while operating a vehicle and using SafetyTracker. This app is designed for use before and/or after operating a vehicle. Use extreme caution while operating a vehicle. Always pay attention to the road and please do not text and drive. It can wait.Privacy We will not provide any of your information to third parties. Your information is solely used to provide you with a better experience using our application.
